  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Checks for players colliding with the platform, and kills them. Moves the platform in the correct direction.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Platform

    • getInteraction

      public boolean getInteraction​(Player player)
      Checks if a player is within the interaction area, which is determined by the crushing side.
      Parameters:
      player - The player object which is being checked
      Returns:
      A boolean representing whether the given player is within the interaction radius
